input.sentences: today there was an event at the rehab facility .
we arrived to a large audience .
we first were balancing balloons with a racket .
after we were interviewed for the news .
then the anchor read a story to the kids .
output.sentences: The rehab facility hosted an event.
Everyone was excited as the audience arrived.
There were rackets and balloons and balancing beams.
The news was even there for an interview.
One of the doctors even read a story for the kids.
